name: aws-lambda-functions
description: A set of AWS Lambda functions that interact with AWS services
author: Radek Drweski

scripts.deploy:getGoogleMapsApiKey: powershell Compress-Archive -Path getGoogleMapsApiKey.mjs -DestinationPath getGoogleMapsApiKey.zip; aws lambda update-function-code --function-name getGoogleMapsApiKey --zip-file fileb://getGoogleMapsApiKey.zip --no-cli-pager; Remove-Item -Path ./getGoogleMapsApiKey.zip
